subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Though this year’s Preakness will be remembered for when Barbaro took a catastrophic misstep, many believe Bernardini turned in a powerful performance at the race.
snippet: Though this year’s Preakness will be remembered for when Barbaro took a catastrophic misstep, many believe Bernardini turned in a powerful performance at the race.
